mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ogden, Francis Barber, 1783-1857
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Tells of the arrival of the Florida; will feel relief to see his name gazetted; mentions the nomination and approbation by the Senate of Commodore David Porter as U.S. Consul Gen. to Algiers; mentions the shipment of Stilton cheese being sent to him on the Canada. Autographed Letter Signed Including ALS, 15 April 1830, from Francis Barber Ogden, to his JM wife Eliza (Douglas) Monroe, n.p., telling much family news.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Francis Barber Ogden, Liverpool, Eng., to James Monroe, n.p., 15 April 1830.
